contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: I'd be happy to discuss your project. Fill out the form below with some details about what you're looking to build, and I'll get back to you within 24 hours.

response_time.title: Response Time
response_time.content: I typically respond within 24 hours on business days (Monday-Friday). If you don't hear back within that time, please check your spam folder or send a follow-up.

what_happens_next.title: What Happens Next
what_happens_next.intro: After you submit this form, here's what to expect:
steps: I'll reply with initial thoughts and questions
We'll schedule a call if it seems like a good fit
I'll provide a detailed proposal with timeline and pricing

what_to_include.title: What to Include
what_to_include.intro: Help me understand your project better by including:
items: What business problem you're trying to solve
Existing systems that need to integrate

no_pressure.title: No Pressure
no_pressure.content: Reaching out doesn't commit you to anything. I'll give you an honest assessment of whether I'm the right fit for your project. If I'm not, I'll tell youâ€”and if possible, point you in a better direction.
